The $dungeonadj_any floor has been worn down by years of use. The floor is $dungeonadj_any and appears unscathed by mass footfall. The $dungeonadj_any floor is bare and dirtless. The floor has bits of bones and rotten flesh. The $dungeonadj_any floor has bits of rotten and half-eaten animal parts. Earthly spines jut out from the ceiling and the floor. Sharp pointed rocks on the ceiling and floor provide plenty of navigational obstacles.
There are several menacing stalagtites and stalagmites to navigate around. A series of undecipherable scribbles sit on the walls. It looks like something might have died here. You might have just stepped on a frog. Something indescribable makes you feel lonesome and sad here.
The $dungeonadj_any ceiling is too far above you to see clearly. The ceiling is $dungeonadj_any. The $dungeonadj_any ceiling is unsettling.
A layer of dirt upon the ground is marked with various tracks. Dust has settled on the ground from scarce use.
The stench is quite unbearable. A musty, dank smell wafts through the air. You think you smell brimstone. The first thing you notice is the stench. The stink in here is horrible.
The air is $dungeonadj_nonphys. $dungeonadj_nonphys air hovers around you. This air is $dungeonadj_nonphys and $dungeonadj_nonphys. The air is not quite as $dungeonadj_nonphys here.
This place is $dungeonadj_anynosize. You feel $dungeonadj_nonphys. You thought you felt a breeze.
You think you heard a sound of faint trickling in the distance. The walls seems to groan. Faint $dungeonadj_feeling sounds can be heard in the distance.
You are certain you just heard (a(n)) $dungeonadj_feeling scream coming from somewhere. You can hear the $dungeonadj_feeling sounds of human suffering. You hear $dungeonadj_feeling sounds coming from all around you. You wonder if an execution occurred here.
You hear $dungeonadj_feeling snickering nearby. You hear the $dungeonadj_feeling sounds of pattering feet nearby. You hear faint but $dungeonadj_feeling squealing sounds echoing around you.
